name: Legends of Power Stones
description:
Use strength and intelligence controlling an archer and a knight to solve challenging puzzles on a journey in search of Power Gems to save the world from an evil wizard.

Controlls:

- Left Mouse Button to move characters

- Space bar to switch character

- Escape (Esc) to pause game

Devs:

Luiz Angelo "Schumacher": Programmer

Gustavo Leite:  Sound Designer

Emiliano Didier: UI/UX / 2D Artist

Tiago Pacheco: Game Director / Tech Artist
